name: Sand Stream
short-desc: Summons a sandstorm that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.
long-desc: The weather changes to a sandstorm when this Pokemon enters battle and does not end unless cancelled by another weather condition.  If multiple Pokemon with this ability, , , or  are sent out at the same time, the abilities will activate in order of Speed, respecting .  Each ability's weather will cancel the previous weather, and only the weather summoned by the slowest of the Pokemon will stay.  Overworld: If the lead Pokemon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.
